WorkItem.Description:
MUI RadioButton template uses TextBlock to display content, why dont replace it with content presenter, which will allow do such a things:
![Image](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-bgWwcvK9Z2s/UyHArXmsgCI/AAAAAAAACEU/D57JEOh8A04/s284/1.png)

```
<TextBlock Text="{TemplateBinding Content}" VerticalAlignment="Center" />
```
=>
```
 <ContentPresenter VerticalAlignment="Center" />
```

Comments.Message: Hm, few months old...still no solution?
